body.name: Lerliuo Nightstand with Charging Station and USB Ports, 3-Tier End Side Table with Storage Drawer and Shelf, Modern Bedside Night Stand for Bedroom, Living Room- Retro Brown
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 10 hrs 21 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: {Nightstand with Charging Station]: This 2 Standard Plug Outlets & 2 USB Ports design of this nightstand allows you to charge multiple electronic devices at the same time, such as cell phone, tablet, laptop etc.It makes the power outlet much closer to you and more convenient to use.Curing battery anxiety, it is a good assistant for those who rely heavily on electronic equipments.It's first mission is to save your time and make life more comfortable.

[Style & Design]:We combined wooden boards and sturdy metal frame, making it present a rustic and retro style. This night stands with drawer and storage shelves offer you multi-purpose space for storing and organizing.You can place it next to the sofa or bed, and the simple square design of the side table could fit with all position.

[Safe and Reliable]:The oak grey bedside tables is made from high grade wood panels, which is built to last for a long time.4 round shape adjustable feet are designed for easy leveling on uneven floors and protecting floors from scratches.

[Assemble Easier]:Complete instruction book and numbered parts ensure the assemble process smooth and simple.We provide a L shaped allen wrench for assembly.The small bed side adopts a simple vertical design, which reduces the complexity and saves space to a great extent.Making it a versatile end table that is indispensable in the home.

[Our Promise]:We offer premium products for you and provide thoughtful and sincerely considerate customer care.We design the package particularly with thicker foam, firm edges as well as two-tier packaging to protect the nightstand with drawer in good condition upon arriving.
body.description: Lerliuo Nightstand End Table with Power Outlet USB Ports and Drawer Safe and Reliable Materials. Offering you a good more convenient living environment. You can place it next to the sofa or bed, the simple design will fit in any position. A built-in socket with 2-Outlet & 2 USB Ports is enough for your tablet, laptop and phone.

Adjustable Feet Adjustable feet make it more stable and fit for any position.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very easy to put together
reviews.reviewText: This item was very easy to out together. The instructions were easy to follow. No tools were necessary. It’s study, good quality of products and looks nice. A great addition to our guest bedroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought these for my son's room. Wanted better storage and organization for some of his electronics, books, misc. Assembly was super easy, my 11 year old did most of it himself and I was very proud of him. Came packed well.My one criticism is that they are a little smaller than I would have liked, even after premeasuring. But they are working out great, and the Grey finish looks awesome in his room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great value, easy assembly
reviews.reviewText: So easy to piece together. Looks great. Functional. Sturdy. Only complaint is the drawer is a little wonky- there is no track, just a lip to stop it from pulling all the way out... but it does the job!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars very sturdily made, works well
reviews.reviewText: I thought it seemed small, but it was perfect bedside, especially with my new floor reading lamps. Opened up a lot of space. A good deal for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small but sturdy
reviews.reviewText: It doesn’t look cheap. It’s on the small side, but it’s what I wanted. The directions were a little funky, but use common sense and it’s a breeze to put together. BTW, I’m a 67 year-old female retired teacher. I put it together by myself with no problem.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice size for tiny space
reviews.reviewText: I would have given 5 ⭐️ BUT one of the bolts doesn’t have ant threading for the screw to feed into. Therefore one corner of the top part of the nightstand can not be secured. And it’s a bolt that is built into the board, so, I can’t take it out and replace it. Super bummed because this isn’t something you’d know until the last step of assembling the top of the piece to the metal stand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These were realitivly easy to put together, seem study so far. Really like the charging ports and the edges so nothing falls off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Small but affordable
reviews.reviewText: These are not hard wood and don't look like great quality, but match the price point. The assembly instructions were not very clear, you have to make sure you really look at the pictures to line up the correct placement (the top piece has to be facing a certain direction). They look nice but a little small, but I love the built in outlets
It's good quality, stands at a perfect hight for my bed with frame, and handy to have the usb and plug! It's decent size to fit a desk lamp on, my two cell phones, remote, and a drink fine
